ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: 1. There are more  important things to me in life than using substances
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Somewhat Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 2. In general I am happy with my life
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Somewhat Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 3. I have enough energy to complete the tasks I set for myself
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Somewhat Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 4. I am proud of the community I live in and feel a part of it
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Somewhat Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 5. I get lots of support from friends
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Somewhat Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 6. I regard my life as challenging and fulfilling without the need for using drugs or alcohol
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Somewhat Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 7. My living space has helped to drive my recovery journey
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Somewhat Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 8. I take full responsibility for my actions
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Somewhat Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 9. I am happy dealing with a range of professional people
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Somewhat Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: 10. I am making good progress on my recovery journey
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Somewhat Disagree; 4= Somewhat Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree
